summary.Title: Student Assistant
summary.Presentation: Do you have interests in tourism, IT and attention to detail? Do you like to be challenged and consider yourself a problem-solver attitude? Then we have the perfect student job for you.

WorkPlace.Name: VOS ApS
WorkPlace.Description: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.

HiringOrg.Name: VOS ApS
HiringOrg.Description: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have interests in tourism, IT and attention to detail? Do you like to be challenged and consider yourself a problem-solver attitude? Then we have the perfect student job for you.

 

As a student assistant, you will be an important part of our team, and you will help solve a wide range of different tasks and at the same time sharpen your skills in many different disciplines of the tourism/travel industry.

 

Your summary tasks will be:

  • Ad hoc accounting tasks such as invoice approvals and system/bank reconciliations.
  • Ad hoc operation tasks such as supplier bookings and filing of projects.
  • Project work with website development which can include preparation of content for the website, data entry, image-sourcing and google/SEO optimization.

 

Your professional qualifications:

  • You graduated from high school.
  • You are an experienced user of the Office suite, especially excel.
  • You can communicate in English in both writing and speech.

 

Your personal attributes:

  • You are social and outgoing and have a service minded attitude.
  • You like to work independently and you take responsibility.
  • Your work methodology is structured and you pay attention to detail.
  • You want to learn more and like to share knowledge with the team.
  • You like to be part of an informal and energetic environment, and you can easily adapt.


Please include in your resume when you would be able to start as well as your expectation for salary.
